page.title: 09FARMING
page.content: spreader a water tank carrier, a sheep feeder, a tractor,a pick up truck, a race for separating sheep and lambs and for transporting them. We have 7 cow sheds. One for newly bought calves, one dutch barn for keeping hay and straw, one cubicle house for keeping sheep in winter, ten lambing pens, 1 food store, 1 wood shed, 1 tractor shed, 2 deisel tanks, 1 garage, 1 shed, a silsge clamp, and 2 upstairs rooms for storing straw. My mum, dad, garry's granddad, joe, dan, and me work on the farm. We do not grow any crops except for hay for the cows and sheep. Mainly we buy fodder for the animals and order 2 lorry loads of straw each year. For land cover we have 31 acres. Days in my life on the farm. spring
